content.question: Find the rate of change with respect to time of the number of liters of gasoline used by the car when t = 2 hours. Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Find the rate of change with respect to time of the number of liters of gasoline used by the car when t = 2 hours. Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 4.3: Rates of Change in Applied Contexts Other Than Motion

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify common underlying structures in problems involving different contextual situations.
